mapper.insert: insert into FREE_REPLY (FRNO, FNO, ID, REPLY) values (seq_free_reply.nextval, #{fno}, #{id}, #{reply})
mapper.select: select * from FREE_REPLY where FRNO = #{frno} and DELDT is null
select FRNO, FNO, ID, FRNO2, REPLY, LAYER, BUNDLE, BUNORDER, NICK, THUMB, REGDT, UPTDT from FREE_REPLY where FNO = #{fno} and DELDT is null order by FRNO asc
